Package controller.team.single_team

Class TeamMembersController

java.lang.Object
controller.FrameController
controller.team.single_team.TeamController
controller.team.single_team.TeamMembersController
All Implemented Interfaces:
CloseablePropertyChangeListener, java.beans.PropertyChangeListener, java.util.EventListener
public class TeamMembersController
extends TeamController
implements CloseablePropertyChangeListener
The TeamMembersController manages the TeamMembersPanel tab, displaying and updating the list of members of a team.
Author:
Beata Keresztes
